API Docs for Sandy 3D Engine haXe Port, ver. 3.1.x trunk

sandy.math.FastMath

type
class
Fast trigonometry functions using cache table and precalculated data. Based on Michael Kraus implementation.

Static Variables

HALF_PI : Float

Math constant pi/2.

PRECISION : Int

The precision of the lookup table.

The bigger this number, the more entries there are in the lookup table, which gives more accurate results.

PRECISION_DIV_2PI : Float

PRECISION / TWO_PI.

PRECISION_S : Int

PRECISION - 1.

TWO_PI : Float

Math constant pi*2.

Static Methods

cos(radians : Float) : Float

parameters
radians The value to cosine.
returns
The approximation of the value's cosine.
Returns the cosine of a given value, by looking up it's approximation in a precomputed table.

initialize() : Void

initialized() : Bool

sin(radians : Float) : Float

parameters
radians The value to sine.
returns
The approximation of the value's sine.
Returns the sine of a given value, by looking up it's approximation in a precomputed table.

tan(radians : Float) : Float

parameters
radians The value to tan.
returns
The approximation of the value's tangent.
Returns the tangent of a given value, by looking up it's approximation in a precomputed table.
